analyzer.plot package¶

Submodules¶

analyzer.plot.cl_plot module¶

class analyzer.plot.cl_plot.Plot(data, key)[source]¶

Bases: object

Plot is responsible for building the plot from the data inside of a FileData object. The created axes objects can be accessed via plot.figure[..].subplot[…]

class Subplot(subplot: list)[source]¶

Bases: object

dataclass in which the subplots are stored as a list

Bases: analyzer.plot.cl_regression.Regression

fit()[source]¶
class analyzer.plot.cl_regression.Regression(ax)[source]¶

Bases: object

This module can be used to add trendlines to the plots. The specific regression types inherit from this class

class analyzer.plot.cl_regression.Root(ax)[source]¶

Bases: analyzer.plot.cl_regression.Regression

fit()[source]¶

analyzer.plot.cl_zoom module¶

class analyzer.plot.cl_zoom.Zoom(ax)[source]¶

Bases: object

Zoom implements a functionality for automatically altering the y-Limits of the linked subplots.
